description: Get the warmth of a puffer without looking puffy. This handsome parka combines water resistance, synthetic Thermarator™ Insulation, and an Omni-Heat™ Infinity thermal-reflective liner that helps maintain heat. It features a removable hood for you when you don't need the extra coverage, plus plenty of easy-to-reach pockets.
name: Columbia Sportswear Marquam Peak Fusion Parka - Mens

specs.value: 100% Nylon, 100% Polyester, 85% Polyester, 15% Cotton, Thermarator™ 100% polyester
